article.title: Technology Advancement Group to Produce GPS Survey System
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Â Technology Advancement Group Inc., Dulles, Va. was awarded an $8,832,000 firm-fixed-price, option eligible, non-multi-year contract for production of the Global Positioning Survey System and related support to the U.S. Army Geospatial Center. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers - Geospatial Center, Alexandria, Va., is the contracting activity (W5J9CQ-13-D-0003).
